titles.title: A bill to designate the outpatient clinic of the Veterans' Administration to be on New Jersey State Route 70 in Brick Township, New Jersey, as the "James J. Howard Veterans' Outpatient Clinic".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 6/7/1988--Introduced. Designates the outpatient clinic of the Veterans Administration located in Brick Township, New Jersey, as the James J. Howard Veterans' Outpatient Clinic.
